phrases: I wanted to ask you a little favor.
You see, the wind yesterday knocked down our scarecrow and broke it.
And, you know, animals have always liked you, right?
I know it sounds funny to ask you to take a scarecrow's place,
but if you would stick around near the field
and attract the animals to you, it would be a great help.
I guess I startled you when I just showed up and started talking to you.
All you have to do is stay right here.
Oh, Hina-chan's taking the scarecrow's place?
All the animals go straight to her.
She is much more reliable than any real scarecrow.
Hina-chan, thank you for being our scarecrow today.
You are such a sweet girl.
I wish we had a scarecrow as cute as you in our fields.
It is not often we see such a quiet girl, is it?
She really is just like a scarecrow.
She has the spirit of a pro!
This is just the way I have always been...
Standing in the field every day is exhausting.
There is nothing to do out here...
But I cannot just tell them I am quitting now...
Thanks to you, the animals do not come close anymore,
so we can concentrate on working in the fields without worrying.
Take these to eat with your family.
You were out late again, huh?
Here, use these for dinner tonight.
Lately, Hinako's been bringing vegetables from somewhere.
And she is been getting home late.
Sh-She could not be stealing from the fields, could she?!
It is so warm out today.
She is here to be our scarecrow again today?
What a big help she is!
I will get her vegetables for today.
She will catch a cold if she stays out here like this.
Am I a jizo statue now?
Thanks for being our scarecrow again today.
YOU-Um... These... I... I should also... tha... than...
Hurry on home before it gets dark.
I still have not been able to thank them for the vegetables.
All I can do is practice.
My daughter is currently wearing a costume and talking to a bird...
Tanuki-san, you can be the old man, okay?
He and his wife are always very kind to me,
so I want to be able to thank them properly.
Thank you for all you have done for me.
Here are your vegetables for today.
My mother always looks forward to them, too.
Recently, when she sees the vegetables I bring home,
she starts planning our meals for the week with them.
The vegetables from your fields are so delicious!
You did great work again today.
Th-Thank you for always giving them to me.
I will be counting on you again, I am sure.
Better try your best to get better at speaking, too, eh?
I have to try my hardest here.
I have to try hard so I can stand on a stage
and learn to talk skillfully to people.
The high school's theater club is on hiatus...
I will get breakfast ready right away.
By the way, are you really going to start a theater troupe, Hina-chan?
The theater club is on hiatus because the advisor left on a theater trip, right?
Why did the advisor leave, though?
As I am now, I am not fit to be your advisor.
I will come back when I am!
She said she suddenly felt that her skills had reached a limit.
Sh-She sounds like a passionate teacher.
What are the other members of the club doing?
They are all keeping active in their own ways,
going out for TV auditions and such.
But you have just been practicing by yourself at the park all this time, right?
I want to act with everyone.
Why do you want to get into theater?
Is there any role you are particularly good at?
Obviously, that would be a scarecrow.
So that is why you want to be in theater.
As you can see, I get so nervous in front of people, and I want to fix that.
That is why I want to try theater.
B-But I am never going to get anywhere this way, am I?
I was nervous at my first performance, too.
I could not say my lines very well.
That is right, you were a child actress, were not you?
My dad was a stage actor,
so it happened naturally while I helped at his rehearsals.
Can you grab those props for me?
The girl playing Girl A suddenly got sick!
Will we have to cancel today's show?
Chiaki-chan, can you be a stand-in?
That would make anyone nervous, child or not!
Is your father still a stage actor?
No, my dad became a guitarist after that.
He travels the world, playing and singing, while he manages an apartment building.
Right now, he is apparently playing the maracas.
Sounds like quite a free spirit...
2) Coat the inside of a pie pan with butter.
Lay the thawed crust in the pan and trim any excess.
Poke a few holes in the bottom with a fork and chill in the refrigerator for 30 minutes.
Use a cookie cutter for cute and easy core removal!
Let the slices sit in salt water.
Do not forget to peel them!!
Cooking Drill: Apple Pie Ingredients 1 frozen pie crust 1 apple 30g sugar 1/2 tbsp. lemon juice Small amount of butter *Thaw the pie crust at room temperature.
Oh, it sounds like it is going to rain soon.
And I thought we would be able to dry the laundry...
Hina-chan, can you talk to animals?
It is more like just intuition...
Animals have always been drawn to me.
After a while, it just came naturally.
I think she would be more suited to the circus than to theater...
Hina-chan, why do not we try forming a theater troupe after all?
What you said earlier made me see that you really want to be in theater.
But there is no telling when the school theater club will start up again.
How about we make use of your talent to put on a play with real animals?
But that story would not need any human actors, would it?
Whoever played the grandma would be killed!
She would get eaten by the wolf!
Actually, did not Little Red Riding Hood get eaten, too?
This is harder than I thought.
Do you really think I can be an actress?
Maybe you can start behind the scenes instead of jumping right into acting.
There is a lot of work to do in a theater troupe besides just acting.
Like makeup, set design, script writing,
and putting together props and costumes.
They also need someone to book venues for after-parties,
That is the most important thing!
I want to work behind the scenes!
I am good with my hands, and I can make clothes!
No, Mayu-chan, you need to be front and center.
Because you are as cute as a doll.
You have a nice voice, too.
Mayu-chan, you would look great in a princess role!
I am telling you, I cannot!
In the first place, we have not even decided we are going to
Hearing them talk about it made it sound kind of fun.
I have always been interested in things like scripts, anyway.
Also, I want to see Mayu-chan playing a princess.
I told you, I am not going to be an actress!
I think you would be a perfect fit, though...
It is a little early, but shall we have lunch?
The new fabric softener I bought to try out the other day smells so nice too...
Buying that was a good choice!
I will definitely be buying it again!
The weather's nice today, so it is a perfect day to do the laundry!
We can dry the bath towels and sheets quickly and fold, fold, fold...
Today's Opening Time 12:30 Please Bear With Us
But even if we do start a theater troupe,
is there a place where we could practice acting?
I was thinking we could make a stage at the back of the coffee shop
and use it as a theater.
You have thought that far ahead?
You are really into this idea, huh?
I always thought it would be nice if we could hold regular stage productions here someday.
You are more shrewd than I thought...
It would conform with the apartment rules, so why not?
Residents have to work here in the shop!
If you do not want to be in the troupe,
would you rather work in the coffee shop?
Or would you rather work in the used bookstore?
Is th-this... the book you are l-looki
I-I would like to be in the theater troupe, please.
I think you would make a better principal.
I only jumped on board with your idea.
B-Besides, Aki-chan has to deal with her work as landlady, too.
Is working as a landlady really that busy?
Me as the principal of the troupe...
I do not think anyone wants this theater troupe to happen more than you do.
I-I am inexperienced, but I will be counting on your support!
We are looking forward to it.
Buy for Tomorrow: Coffee Beans Filters
Today's Opening Time 14:00 Please Bear With Us
If we are going to start a theater troupe,
we will need to come up with a troupe name.
Since it was her idea, it should include Hina-chan's name!
Or, for more impact, maybe Hinako Deluxe.
Or maybe Hinako and Her Merry Band?
The Hitotose Troupe... I like it!
Now that our troupe has a name,
I need to open the shop.
C-Can I get all of your contact information?
An SNS might be better than email.
I am sorry... what is an SNS?
I am going to open the shop, okay?
YOU-Uh... C-Can I have more pasta?
I got all these new contacts in just one day!
YOU-Um, what brings you all here?
We were wondering if you would decided what we should do with the troupe.
No, I do not even know where we should start...
I guess you do not have any stage experience yet.
So we did some research on theater troupes.
And we found that there is a famous place in Shimokitazawa called Suzuran...
It is a very historical theater that everyone dreams of performing in.
Why do not we try to get there?
It is always better to dream big.
I am all for it, too.
Then Suzuran will be our goal.
Let us put together a great act!
It is always better to dream big!
Bigger taiyaki and dorayaki are always more exciting, too!
Just thinking about what awaits in our future makes me so excited!
